column4: Hey ive got a question, i'm trying to install Ubuntu right (first timer) and i was following along a guide, but it says i cant install on an NTFS partition, is linux compatible with a FAT32? and can i install linux on a portable harddrive?
not to mention the ubuntu installer wouldnt let me resize my partition, which im assuming is due to the fact that its NTFS in this first place
linux has its own filesystems, will not use ntfs or fat
